refnamediv.refpurpose: Simplified embedding of widgets in Bonobo.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Bonobo component embedding for hydrocephalic imbeciles.

This purpose of BonoboWidget is to make container-side use of Bonobo as easy as pie. This widget has two functions:
Provide a simple wrapper for embedding Controls. Embedding controls is already really easy, but BonoboWidget reduces the work from about 5 lines to 1. To embed a given control, just do:
bw = bonobo_widget_new_control ("id for control", toplevel_ui_handler); gtk_container_add (some_container, bw);
You are free to make the 2nd (UIContainer) argument to bonobo_widget_new_control() be CORBA_OBJECT_NIL.
To provide an extremely simple wrapper for using Monikers. In fact all BonoboWidget use uses the OAFIID: moniker to activate its sub-components. However monikers (bonobo-moniker-util) are far more powerful than this:
bw = bonobo_widget_new_control ("file:/demo/a.jpeg", toplevel_ui_handler);
will launch an application that can render a jpeg as a control, usualy the Eye Of Gnome (EOG), and embed it as a control.
There are also functions for fetching and setting values in the Control PropertyBag, but the use of these functions is discouraged.

refsect2.title: struct BonoboWidgetClass
bonobo_widget_new_control ()
refsect2.para: This function is a simple wrapper for easily embedding controls into applications. It will launch the component identified by id and will return it as a GtkWidget.

listitem.simpara: A Moniker describing the object to be activated
Bonobo_UIContainer for the launched object or CORBA_OBJECT_NIL if there is no need of menu / toolbar merging.
A GtkWidget that is bound to the Bonobo Control.

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_new_control_from_objref ()
refsect2.para: This function is a simple wrapper for easily embedding controls into applications. This function is used when you have already a CORBA object reference to an IDL:Bonobo/Control:1.0 (the control) argument.

listitem.simpara: A CORBA Object reference to an IDL:Bonobo/Control:1.0
Bonobo_UIContainer for the launched object or CORBA_OBJECT_NIL if there is no need of menu / toolbar merging.
the control wrapped as a GtkWidget.

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_get_control_frame ()
refsect2.para: Every IDL:Bonobo/Control:1.0 needs to be placed inside an IDL:Bonobo/ControlFrame:1.0. This returns the BonoboControlFrame object that wraps the Control in the bonobo_widget.

listitem.simpara: The BonoboControlFrame associated with the bonobo_widget
the CORBA object reference to the Bonobo_UIContainer associated with the bonobo_widget.

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_new_control_async ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkWidget* bonobo_widget_new_control_async (const char *moniker, Bonobo_UIContainer uic, BonoboWidgetAsyncFn fn, gpointer user_data);
refsect2.para: This method creates a widget, returns it to the user, and asynchronously activates a control to insert into the widget.

listitem.simpara: A Moniker describing the object to be activated
Bonobo_UIContainer for the launched object or CORBA_OBJECT_NIL if there is no need of menu / toolbar merging.
a callback function called when the activation has happend
user data to be passed back to the callback.
a (temporarily) empty Widget to be filled with the control later

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_construct_control_from_objref ()
refsect2.programlisting: BonoboWidget* bonobo_widget_construct_control_from_objref (BonoboWidget *bw, Bonobo_Control control, Bonobo_UIContainer uic, CORBA_Environment *ev);
refsect2.para: This is a constructor function. Only usable for wrapping and derivation of new objects. For normal use, please refer to bonobo_widget_new_control_from_objref.

listitem.simpara: A BonoboWidget to construct
A CORBA Object reference to an IDL:Bonobo/Control:1.0
Bonobo_UIContainer for the launched object or CORBA_OBJECT_NIL if there is no need of menu / toolbar merging.
a CORBA exception environment
A BonoboWidget (the bw)

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_construct_control ()
refsect2.programlisting: BonoboWidget* bonobo_widget_construct_control (BonoboWidget *bw, const char *moniker, Bonobo_UIContainer uic, CORBA_Environment *ev);
refsect2.para: This is a constructor function. Only usable for wrapping and derivation of new objects. For normal use, please refer to bonobo_widget_new_control.
This function will unref the passed in bw in case it cannot launch the component and return NULL in such a case. Otherwise it returns the bw itself.

listitem.simpara: A BonoboWidget to construct
A Moniker describing the object to be activated
Bonobo_UIContainer for the launched object or CORBA_OBJECT_NIL if there is no need of menu / toolbar merging.
a CORBA exception environment
A BonoboWidget or NULL

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_set_property ()
refsect2.para: This is a utility function used to set a number of properties in the Bonobo Control in control.

This function takes a variable list of arguments that must be NULL terminated. Arguments come in tuples: a string (for the argument name) and the data type that is to be transfered. The implementation of the actual setting of the PropertyBag values is done by the bonobo_property_bag_client_setv() function).
This only works for BonoboWidgets that represent controls (ie, that were returned by bonobo_widget_new_control_from_objref() or bonobo_widget_new_control().

listitem.simpara: A BonoboWidget that represents an IDL:Bonobo/Control:1.0
first property name to set.

refsect2.title: bonobo_widget_get_property ()
refsect2.para: This is a utility function used to get a number of properties in the Bonobo Control in control.

This function takes a variable list of arguments that must be NULL terminated. Arguments come in tuples: a string (for the argument name) and a pointer where the data will be stored. The implementation of the actual setting of the PropertyBag values is done by the bonobo_property_bag_client_setv() function).
This only works for BonoboWidgets that represent controls (ie, that were returned by bonobo_widget_new_control_from_objref() or bonobo_widget_new_control().

listitem.simpara: A BonoboWidget that represents an IDL:Bonobo/Control:1.0
first property name to set.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: BonoboControl, BonoboControlFrame, BonoboObject, BonoboView, BonoboEmbeddable, BonoboUIContainer, BonoboItemContainer.
